## RushConfiguration.commonAutoinstallersFolder property

The fully resolved path for the "autoinstallers" folder. Example: `C:\MyRepo\common\autoinstallers`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get commonAutoinstallersFolder(): string;
```
